resources.string: Thank you for trying MobSy: MOBile Sightseeing sYstem!
Browse the area around you and get info about the nearby sites on-the-go
Follow the guided predefined routes of attractions

You are approaching Kazan Kremlin, the chief historic citadel of Tatarstan, situated in the city of Kazan. It was built on behest of Ivan the Terrible on the ruins of the former castle of Kazan khans. It was declared a World Heritage Site in 2000.
